department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程將介紹人類如何成功（或不成功）地從經驗中獲取資訊、儲存資訊，並在需要時檢索資訊的研究。我們將主要探討行為學研究，但也會在一定程度上涵蓋神經生物學、神經心理學和神經影像學的研究。
goal.en: This course will introduce you to the study of how human beings successfully (or unsuccessfully) acquire information from experiences, store the information, and retrieve the information when necessary. We will cover mostly behavioral studies, but would also include neurobiological, neuropsychological, and neuroimaging studies to a certain extent.

outline.ch:
每週我們將集中討論一個特定主題，並配有一組指定閱讀資料。課堂上將先對每個主題進行概括介紹，隨後由你們報告指定的閱讀資料內容。閱讀資料應在課前完成。必要時會佈置作業，請在截止日期前完成。
每週主題與閱讀資料（暫定，可能更改）
課程導覽與總體介紹

記憶與情緒
outline.en:
Each week we will focus on one specific discussion topic, which is associated with a set of assigned readings. In the class there will be a general introduction for each topic followed by the reports of the readings assigned to you. The readings should be completed before the class. Assignments will be given when necessary, and you should complete them before due dates.
Weekly Topics and Readings (tentative, subject to change)
1. Course Orientation and General Introduction
2. Research Methods in Memory Studies
3. Sensory Memory ＆ Short-Term Memory
4. Working Memory
5. Episodic Memory
6. Forgetting and Long-Term Memory Failure
7. Autobiographic Memory
8. Semantic Memory
9. Project Proposal Presentation
10. Memory for Space and Time
11. Nondeclarative Memory
12. Memory and Reality, Memory and Law
13. Memory across the Lifespan
14. Memory Problems and Disorders
15. Memory and Emotion
16. Film Watching and Discussion“

textbook.ch:

1. Gabriel A. Radvansky. (2017). Memory (3rd edition). New York: Taylor ＆ Francis
2. Scott D. Slotnick (2017). Cognitive Neuroscience of Memory: From Brain to Behavior (2nd Edition). Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.


Supplementary Readings:
1. Roediger, H. L., Dudai, Y., ＆ Fitzpatrick, S. M. (Eds.) (2007). Science of Memory: Concepts. Oxford: Oxford University Press.
2. Byrne, J. H. (Ed.) (2008). Learning and Memory – A comprehensive reference. New York: Academic Press.“
